summary: Completed testing of Level Popover and VS label positioning fixes. Both primary issues have been successfully resolved with minor mobile action button visibility concern.

ui_bugs.issue: Action buttons (GuessIt, Advance, Remove) not fully visible on mobile 390px viewport
ui_bugs.notes: May be viewport/scrolling issue rather than actual bug - vote buttons are visible correctly

passed_tests: Level popover NOT visible by default (conditional rendering fix working)
VS labels found in NOT_STARTED matches positioned next to away team names
Score displays have score-block styling for live matches
Desktop 2-column grid layout preserved and working
Vote buttons (1, X, 2) visible on mobile
Match cards render both grid and list layouts correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Both primary fixes verified successful: 1) Level popover now uses conditional rendering and is not visible by default, 2) VS labels appear inline next to away team names. Minor issue with action button visibility on mobile may need investigation but doesn't affect core functionality.
